content: i know this pattern will be very popular indeed it is available in smaller sizes and i have been asked many times for this bigger size so pretty knitted from the top down and just 2 sleeve seams to join requirements ~ yarn any dk gauge 22sts over 4 /10cm i used 130g of acrylic dk around 390 metres needles 4mm throughout requires 3 or 6 small buttons perfect for a pre-school toddler of around 3 years of age **to get this free pattern please click on the https link just below ↓**
